guide.introduction: I design home additions. Knowing the pitch of a roof is a critical step in designing an addition or estimating roof areas for shingles, insulation and ventilation requirements. Figuring the roof area is a lot easier and safer with this tool.

lines.text: OK, if you really would like to give this and want to make it as good and durable as possible, go to a copy center like Staples or OfficeMax and have it printed in color on No-Tear paper. It really is the best; it costs about $1.50 and is worth every penny. Also try to find some thin vinyl (re-purposed) rather than card stock for the backing material. I have not tried it yet but hot laminating with 5 or 10 mil and cutting it at the copy center would work nicely, I think.
